name: station_id
description: A unique ID is given to the location of the sample and should consist of the first 4 letters of the river name followed by an underscore and the number of kilometers upstream the location is from the ocean e.g., "LOSA - 2.3km" This value needs to be a character format.

name: latitude
description: Latitude should be a value between 25.00000 and 50.00000.

name: latitude_3
description: The values for latitude should be reported in numeric format.

name: latitude_2
description: The values for latitude should be reported in decimal degrees to five places.

name: longitude_3
description: The values for longitude should be reported in numeric format.

name: longitude_2
description: The values for longitude should be reported in decimal degrees to five places.

name: longitude
description: Longitude should be a number between -125.00000 and -67.00000 .

name: event_id
description: event_id must be in character format.

name: event_id_2
description: event_id must be one of Low, High, or Flood.

name: sample_type_2
description: sample_type must be a character value.

name: sample_type
description: sample_type must be one of Surface Whole, Mid Column Whole, Surface Net, Mid Column Net, Net Spike, Whole Spike, Net Blank, or Whole Blank
rule: sample_type %vin% c("Surface Whole", "Mid Column Whole", "Surface Net", "Mid Column Net", "Net Spike", "Whole Spike", "Net Blank", "Whole Blank")

name: replicate_id_2
description: replicate_id must an integer.

name: replicate_id
description: replicate_id must be a whole number of 1, 2, 3 or 4

name: recorder
description: recorder must be a character value.

name: collection_date
description: Date must be between 2022-8-1 and 2024-12-31.

name: collection_date_2
description: collection_date format must be Year-Month-Day (four number year, two number month, two number day).

name: unique
description: Sample information needs to be unique on combinations of station_id, event_id, replicate_id, and sample_type.

name: start_time_2
description: start_time must be between 5:00:00 AM and 20:00:00 PM.

name: start_time
description: start_time should be formatted as 24 hr time in HH:MM:SS format.

name: end_time_2
description: end_time must be between 5:00:00 and 20:00:00.

name: end_time
description: end_time should be formatted as 24 hr time in HH:MM:SS format.

name: sample_width_m_2
description: sample_width_m should be a numeric value.

name: sample_width_m
description: sample_width_m should be between 0.5 and 10000.

name: sample_width_m_3
description: sample_width_m should be less than total_stream_width_m.

name: sample_depth_m_2
description: sample_depth_m should be a numeric type.

name: sample_depth_m_3
description: sample_depth_m should be less than the total_stream_depth_m.

name: sample_depth_m
description: sample_depth_m should be between 0 and 100.

name: deployment_strategy_2
description: deployment_strategy should be a character value.

name: deployment_strategy
description: deployment_strategy should be one of Bridge, Boat, or Wading

name: total_stream_depth_m_2
description: total_stream_depth_m should be a numeric value.

name: total_stream_depth_m
description: total_stream_depth_m should be between 0 and 100.

name: total_stream_width_m_2
description: total_stream_width_m should be a numeric value.

name: total_stream_width_m
description: total_steam_width_m should be between 0.5 and 10000.

name: flow_meter_start_2
description: flow_meter_start should be an integer value.

name: flow_meter_start
description: flow_meter_start should be between 0 and 10000.

name: flow_meter_end_2
description: flow_meter_end should be an integer value.

name: flow_meter_end
description: flow_meter_end should be between 0 and 10000.

name: number_containers_2
description: number_containers should be an integer.

name: number_containers
description: number_containers should be between 0 and 20.

name: comments
description: comments should be a character value.

name: sample_collection_device_2
description: sample_collection_device should be a character value.

name: sample_collection_device
description: sample_collection_device should be one of Niskin Sampler, D84 Grab Sampler, Bed-Load Sampler, or Box Trawl.
rule: sample_collection_device %vin% c("Niskin Sampler", "D84 Grab Sampler", "Bed-Load Sampler", "Box Trawl")

name: aperature_width_m_2
description: aperature_width_m should be a numeric value.

name: aperature_width_m
description: aperature_width_m should be between 0.01 and 10.

name: aperature_height_m_2
description: aperature_height_m should be a numeric value.

name: aperature_height_m
description: aperature_height_m should be between 0.01 and 10.

name: net_mesh_um
description: net_mesh_um should be between 200 and 400.

name: net_mesh_um_2
description: net_mesh_um should be a numeric value.
